t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    integers = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = 0
    for i in range(q):
        (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
        diff = r - l + 1
        if diff % 2 != 0:
            ans += 1
    print(ans + sum(integers))

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = 0
    for i in range(q):
        (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
        d = x - y + 1
        c += d % 2
    print(sum(a) + c)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    li = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    s = sum(li)
    while m > 0:
        (nn, mm) = map(int, input().split(' '))
        c = 1
        if nn == mm:
            s = s + 1
        elif (mm - nn - 1) % 2 == 1:
            s = s + 1
        m = m - 1
    print(s)
    t = t - 1

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, q) = input().split()
    n = int(n)
    q = int(q)
    A = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    count = 0
    sum1 = 0
    for j in range(n):
        sum1 += A[j]
    for j in range(q):
        A = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
        if (A[1] - A[0]) % 2 == 0:
            count += 1
    print(sum1 + count)

for i in range(int(input())):
    nandq = input().split()
    n = int(nandq[0])
    q = int(nandq[1])
    arr = input().split()
    count = 0
    for j in range(q):
        landr = input().split()
        l = int(landr[0])
        r = int(landr[1])
        count += (r - l + 1) % 2
    sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        sum += int(arr[i])
    sum += count
    print(sum)

    for i in range(q):

T = int(input())
for tc in range(T):
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())

t = int(input())
while t:
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = sum(l)
    for i in range(q):
        (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
        p = y - x + 1
        if p % 2 != 0:
            s += 1
    print(s)
    t -= 1

t = int(input())
while t:
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))[:n]
    sm = sum(arr)
    while q:
        (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
        if (l - r) % 2 == 0:
            sm += 1
        q -= 1
    print(sm)
    t -= 1

        (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
        if (l - r) % 2 == 0:
            sm += 1
        q -= 1

    t -= 1

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = sum(a)
    for i in range(q):
        (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
        if (l + r + 1) % 2 == 1:
            x = x + 1
    print(x)
    t = t - 1

T = int(input())
for t in range(T):
    (N, Q) = (int(i) for i in input().split())
    A = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    res = sum(A)
    for q in range(Q):
        (q1, q2) = (int(i) for i in input().split())
        res += (q2 - q1 + 1) % 2
    print(res)

T = int(input())
for t in range(T):

    A = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

        (q1, q2) = (int(i) for i in input().split())
        res += (q2 - q1 + 1) % 2

no_of_tc = int(input())
for _ in range(no_of_tc):
    (arr_len, no_of_ops) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    tot = 0
    tot += sum(arr)
    for _ in range(no_of_ops):
        (start, end) = map(int, input().split())
        if (end - start) % 2 == 0:
            tot += 1
    print(tot)

testCase = int(input())
while testCase > 0:
    (N, Q) = input().split()
    N = int(N)
    Q = int(Q)
    sum = 0
    for x in input().split():
        sum += int(x)
    for x in range(Q):
        (l, r) = input().split()
        l = int(l)
        r = int(r)
        if (l - r + 1) % 2:
            sum += 1
    print(sum)
    testCase += -1

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t = t - 1
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = sum(l)
    for i in range(q):
        (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
        if (b - a) % 2 == 0:
            s += 1
    print(s)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    (a, b) = ([], [])
    for i in range(q):
        (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
        if r == 0:
            r = l
        a.append(l)
        b.append(r)
    s = 0
    for j in range(q):
        s += (b[j] - a[j] + 1) % 2
    print(sum(arr) + s)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    (a, b) = ([], [])
    for i in range(q):
        (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
        if r == '':
            r = l
        a.append(l)
        b.append(r)
    s = 0
    for j in range(q):
        s += (b[j] - a[j] + 1) % 2
    print(sum(arr) + s)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, q) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    (L, R) = ([], [])
    for j in range(0, q):
        (l1, r1) = map(int, input().split())
        if r1 == '':
            r1 = l1
        L.append(l1)
        R.append(r1)
    s = 0
    for b in range(0, q):
        s += (R[b] - L[b] + 1) % 2
    sum1 = sum(l) + s
    print(sum1)

        (l1, r1) = map(int, input().split())
        if r1 == '':
            r1 = l1
        L.append(l1)
        R.append(r1)
    s = 0

        s += (R[b] - L[b] + 1) % 2
    sum1 = sum(l) + s
    print(sum1)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    (L, R) = ([], [])
    for i in range(k):
        (l, r) = map(int, input().split())
        L.append(l)
        R.append(r)
    s = 0
    for i in range(k):
        s += (R[i] - L[i] + 1) % 2
    print(sum(arr) + s)
